ussr.robotbuildingblocks
Class WorldDescription

java.lang.Object
  ussr.robotbuildingblocks.Description
      ussr.robotbuildingblocks.WorldDescription

public class WorldDescription
extends Description

The description of a world in which a number of robot modules can be placed for the simulation. Defines the number of modules, the size of the underlying plane, and the position of each obstacle (note: obstacles currently have a fixed geometry)

Author:
ups

static class WorldDescription.CameraPosition
          Default camera positions

          A physics-engine independent description of a texture that can be loaded from a file

placeModule

public ModulePosition placeModule(int i)
Generate a random placement for module #i (since the number of modules exceeded the number of supplied module position)

Parameters:
i - the number of the module to place randomly
Returns:
a ModulePosition indicating the placement of the module
Throws:
java.lang.Error - unless the method has been overridden with a simulation-specific implementation in a subclass
